title: sCIP#29 Add Link/sLink pool
body:
Proposing to add a Link/sLink pool that will allow users to trade slippage free using the Curve x Synthetix trading route into and from Link. 

Further details and discussion here:  https://gov.curve.fi/t/add-link-slink-pool/1436
author: 0x6B507494b0f9D86a85A393Df90884a39A974bC64
